generated_code:
"""
Auto-generated Playwright test with adaptive selectors
Browser: VISIBLE MODE for demonstration
"""

from playwright.sync_api import sync_playwright, expect, TimeoutError as PWTimeoutError
import sys
import time


def find_element_adaptive(page, selectors, element_name="element"):
    """Try multiple selectors until one works"""
    for selector in selectors:
        try:
            elem = page.locator(selector).first
            elem.wait_for(state="visible", timeout=5000)
            print(f"  ‚úÖ Found {element_name} using: {selector}")
            return elem
        except:
            continue
    raise Exception(f"Could not find {element_name} with any selector")


def handle_cookie_consent(page):
    """Handle common cookie consent popups"""
    consent_selectors = [
        "button:has-text(\"Accept all\")",
        "button:has-text(\"Accept\")",
        "button:has-text(\"I agree\")",
        "[id*=\"accept\"]",
        "[class*=\"accept\"]"
    ]
    for selector in consent_selectors:
        try:
            page.locator(selector).click(timeout=3000)
            print("  üç™ Accepted cookies")
            return True
        except:
            continue
    return False


def run_test():
    """Execute the test with error handling"""
    print("üé≠ Starting test execution in VISIBLE MODE...")
    
    with sync_playwright() as p:
        # Launch VISIBLE browser with slow motion
        browser = p.chromium.launch(
            headless=False,  # Visible for demo
            slow_mo=900       # Slow motion effect
        )
        context = browser.new_context(
            viewport={"width": 1280, "height": 720},
            user_agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36"
        )
        page = context.new_page()
        
        try:
            print("\n‚û°Ô∏è  Step 1: OPEN_BROWSER")
            try:
                print("  üåê Opening http://127.0.0.1:5500/login.html...")
                page.goto("http://127.0.0.1:5500/login.html", wait_until="domcontentloaded", timeout=30000)
                page.wait_for_load_state("domcontentloaded")
                time.sleep(2)  # Let page stabilize
                
                # Handle cookie consent
                handle_cookie_consent(page)
                
                print("  ‚úÖ Page loaded")
            except Exception as step_error:
                print(f"  ‚ö†Ô∏è  Step 1 error: {step_error}")
                page.screenshot(path="screenshots/error_step_{i}.png")
                raise
            
            print("\n‚û°Ô∏è  Step 2: TYPE")
            try:
                print("  ‚å®Ô∏è  Typing...")
                page.locator("#username").wait_for(state="visible", timeout=10000)
                page.locator("#username").click()
                page.locator("#username").fill("admin")
                time.sleep(1)
                print("  ‚úÖ Typed")
            except Exception as step_error:
                print(f"  ‚ö†Ô∏è  Step 2 error: {step_error}")
                page.screenshot(path="screenshots/error_step_{i}.png")
                raise
            
            print("\n‚û°Ô∏è  Step 3: TYPE")
            try:
                print("  ‚å®Ô∏è  Typing...")
                page.locator("#password").wait_for(state="visible", timeout=10000)
                page.locator("#password").click()
                page.locator("#password").fill("admin123")
                time.sleep(1)
                print("  ‚úÖ Typed")
            except Exception as step_error:
                print(f"  ‚ö†Ô∏è  Step 3 error: {step_error}")
                page.screenshot(path="screenshots/error_step_{i}.png")
                raise
            
            print("\n‚û°Ô∏è  Step 4: CLICK")
            try:
                print("  üëÜ Clicking: login button")
                page.locator("#loginBtn").wait_for(state="visible", timeout=10000)
                page.locator("#loginBtn").click()
                time.sleep(2)
                print("  ‚úÖ Clicked")
            except Exception as step_error:
                print(f"  ‚ö†Ô∏è  Step 4 error: {step_error}")
                page.screenshot(path="screenshots/error_step_{i}.png")
                raise
            
            print("\n‚úÖ All steps PASSED!")
            print("üõë Browser stays open for 20 seconds for inspection")
            time.sleep(20)
            browser.close()
            return 0
            
        except AssertionError as e:
            print(f"\n‚ùå Assertion failed: {e}")
            page.screenshot(path="screenshots/assertion_failed.png")
            time.sleep(20)
            browser.close()
            return 1
            
        except PWTimeoutError as e:
            print(f"\n‚è±Ô∏è  Timeout: {e}")
            page.screenshot(path="screenshots/timeout_error.png")
            time.sleep(20)
            browser.close()
            return 1
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"\n‚ùå Test FAILED: {e}")
            page.screenshot(path="screenshots/test_error.png")
            time.sleep(20)
            browser.close()
            return 1


if __name__ == "__main__":
    exit_code = run_test()
    sys.exit(exit_code)
